title: Expose Row2Col and Vol2Col
body_html:
This PR addresses #3321, which extends #2580 to temporal and volumetric data. Tests have been extended to the 1D and 3D cases.

One thing to note: fold now requires that output_size is a tuple (it is currently allowed to be an integer in master), as it is impossible to determine what the dimensionality of the output should be just from the col tensor. It's always a 2D tensor (batched).
body_text:
This PR addresses #3321, which extends #2580 to temporal and volumetric data. Tests have been extended to the 1D and 3D cases.
One thing to note: fold now requires that output_size is a tuple (it is currently allowed to be an integer in master), as it is impossible to determine what the dimensionality of the output should be just from the col tensor. It's always a 2D tensor (batched).
body:
This PR addresses #3321, which extends #2580 to temporal and volumetric data. Tests have been extended to the 1D and 3D cases.

One thing to note: `fold` now requires that `output_size` is a tuple (it is currently allowed to be an integer in master), as it is impossible to determine what the dimensionality of the output should be just from the `col` tensor. It's always a 2D tensor (batched).
